name: Avoid having variables passed by reference when calling a function (PHP)
description:
Passing a variable by reference to a function will cause the original value to be changed if that variable is modified inside the called function

So we need to ensures that variables are not passed by reference when calling a function.
output: PHP Sections having variables passed by reference when calling a function
remediationSample:
<?php
class myclass extends yourclass implements someint {
    function myfunc($var) {
        echo $var;
    }
}
$myvar = true;
myfunc($myvar);
sample:
<?php
class myclass extends yourclass implements someint {
    function myfunc($var) {
        echo $var;
    }
}
$myvar = true;
myfunc(&$myvar);
